name: Chipotle Lime Cod Fish Tacos
author: richlids
summary: These cod fish tacos are perfect for warm evenings or sunny afternoon family gatherings. If age appropriate, serve with the same cerveza you used in your batter and both the tacos and beer will go down easily.
ingredients: 2  canned chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, seeded and minced
1 tablespoon adobo sauce from chipotle peppers
1 pound cod fillets, cut into 2-inch chunks
directions: Combine flour, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper in a bowl
Mix mayonnaise, chipotle peppers, adobo sauce, and lime juice together in a bowl
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Coat cod pieces in 1/3 cup flour until completely covered
Shake off excess flour; dip into beer batter
Cook cod in oil a few pieces at a time until batter turns a golden brown color, 4 to 5 minutes
Remove from oil and place on paper towels to drain oil excess
Place fried cod pieces on tortillas
Top with lettuce, queso fresco, tomato, red onion, cilantro, and chipotle-lime sauce
